body.name: SANUS Advanced Tilt 4D Premium TV Wall Mount Bracket For Most 42"- 90" Flat Screen TVs - Universal Low Profile Tilting TV Mount. Fits 16",18",24" Studs-Max Weight 150 lbs & Max VESA 600 x 400mm - OLT7
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 17 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 17 hrs 17 mins
features: The SANUS Advanced Premium Tilt TV wall mount is universally compatible with most 42"-90" flat screen TVs including major TV brands such as Samsung, LG, Vizio, Insignia, Sony, Toshiba & more.

The slim profile seamlessly places the TV just 2.1” from the wall for a flush profile. This high quality SANUS TV mount is sturdy yet aesthaetic, it disappear behind your TV and blends in the décor. Featuring a groundbreaking innovative design, the OLT7 extends 6.8" from the wall to allow even larger TVs to achieve a maximum tilt and better glare reduction.

Upgraded viewing experience through enhanced viewing angles thanks to the 15° swivel left/ right and the tilting feature 7° up & 12° down. To tie it all up, the cleverly engineered FluidMotion feature allows the TV to be moved smoothly & effortlessly for a consistently perfect positioning.

SANUS Advanced Tilt TV Mount kit is all inclusive, featuring a comprehensive hardware bag, drilling template, easy to follow install manual, and pre-assembled parts all to keep installation time under 30 minutes. Also, the open wall plate design allows for mounting directly over electrical outlets or media boxes. Last, thanks to the ProSet feature, the mount can be easily adjusted post installation.
Experience the Sanus difference. Comes with a 10 year warranty, and top-notch customer service. Our Minnesota -based experts are ready to chat 7 days a week if you have questions or run into a snag.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SANUS OLT7 Technical Specifications 6" of extension &12 degrees of tiltSupported VESA Patterns: 200 x 200 through 600 x 400Profile: 2.1"Post-install Leveling: +/- 1 degreeCompatible Stud Width: 16" and 24" Compatible wall: Wood studs, solid concrete/ concrete blocks, steel studs ( requires steel stud install kit, not included)What's in the box: Left and right TV brackets, wall plate, wall plate drilling template, Tv Screws (4x - M6 x 12mm, M6 x 20mm, M6 x 35mm, M8 x 16mm, M8 x 20mm, M8 x 30mm, M8 x 40mm, M8 x 50mm), M6/M8 washers, 2.5mm, 5mm, and 22mm spacers, 5/16 inch x 2 3/4 inch lag bolts (4x), Fischer UX10 x 60R concrete anchors (4x), 3/16 inch hex key.Tools Required for Installation: Tape measure, pencil, level, Phillips screwdriver, electric drill, socket wrench with 1/2 inch (13mm) socket, stud finder (wood and steel studs), awl (wood and steel stud), 7/32 inch (5.5mm) wood drill bit (wood stud), 3/8 inch (10mm) concrete drill bit (concrete), hammer (concrete), 1/2 inch (13mm) steel drill bit (steel studs) .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mount, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This was incredibly easy to use. The template I really nice and sturdy and it uses some really good hardware. The ability to tilt edges out and move the TV back and forth to get at the cabling behind it is great.Also, what is really cool, if you go to Sanus' website, you can put in the model of TV, desired height, and get handy measurements for putting up the template.I think all this together meant our bracket went up in ~20 minutes, and the TV in another 5 minutes.Overall, I would buy this again for any TV large enough to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stronk like bull
reviews.reviewText: My long suffering wife and I hung an 85" TV on this bracket and we didn't fight once. I have a bum shoulder from recent surgery so I rigged up a jack to do the bulk of lifting. This is a good idea. Big TVs are still heavy.THe positive CLICK of the bracket when you get it properly in place is a big plus, because you won't be able to see well. The tilting is a bonus even if you will have it flat against the wall to watch TV because you can hang the heavy sucker THEN tilt it and hook up the wiring. This is a big big plus.Hardware that came with it was good. Template was handy. Instructions were clear. It's a good, stronk mount like even mother in law could hang off it. I like my mother in law and she's tiny but this is a joke people. Merry new year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Minimal
reviews.reviewText: Bought to mount an old 2007 40" Sony TV (flatscreen, but heavier than modern 40"). I had never installed a wall mount before, so went slow and measured umpteen times, but the template worked smoothly. You will need a stud finder and I recommend a powered drill. It did install smoothly for me and has held very securely for two months now. A lot of mounting component options for different TV model needs; I am happy to store those for when I am able to get a newer TV. The viewing angles are quite good. It does pull a little ways out from the wall and tips to each side (up, down, right, left) so I can view comfortable across several angles (including diagonally from my kitchen). It is also fairly easy to adjust placement if you need it set a little to one side or the other on the mount bracket. The tension knob is easy to use, which was necessary to keep my old heavyweight from drooping forward unexpectedly. Low-profile visual presence on the wall, though that would depend on the size of the TV being mounted; clean even lines with minimal fuss. Note there is not a lot of clearance between the TV and the wall if you do not keep the TV extended, so if your TV is older like mine with ports facing straight to the back instead of out to the side of the screen, you may need to buy angled adapters for HDMI attachments (e,g, Amazon Fire Stick) or stiff cables.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works but not as sturdy as expected
reviews.reviewText: This TV mount does the job. I did not expect it to be plastic. A little difficult to move from side to side and get the full range of motion. Need to lift the TV gently to move side to side. Does tilt down as well which was desirable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Heavy duty and easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and adjust!
reviews.reviewText: Used thus to install an 85 inch Samsung tv! Easy to install and then has built in adjust for height side to side making it a breeze to level the tv. Would definitely buy again for other TVs in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Range of Motion & Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to mount a 75" TV at about 110 lbs. I wanted a bracket that would tilt enough to provide access to the back of the TV. It is wide enough to anchor into 2 wall studs. The left and right ends of the TV can be pivoted out to allow access to the power and AV cables. The top edge of the TV can tilt forward or lay flat against the wall. The unit offers minor level adjustments after the bracket is mounted to the wall. Overall, I am very pleased with this TV mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Sturdy and easily mounted product
reviews.reviewText: This mount is very easy to install and sturdy. Used it for a 65 inch TV. The packaging contains all the necessary hardware you need to mount it minus the power tools and stud finder.However, it's not as low profile as you'll think. They mentioned that the mount will place your TV only 2.1 inch away from the wall. What was not mentioned is that the 2.1 inch is to the back of your TV from the wall. This is where your TV meets the mount. The Real gap will be 2.1 plus whatever the thickness of your TV is.Other than that, the mount is great and worth the money.
El soporte de de evidente calidad, compacto, fuerte y sencillo de instalar.
